RelatedSentence: Five years after the Government of Guyana and the United States Government signed an assistance agreement for the implementation of programmes like the Leadership and Democracy ( LEAD ) project , the nation learnt that the project has now been put on hold .

This unfortunate development took place following a series of public statements made by various government officials opposing to the project on the grounds that the Government was not consulted in its design , a claim that the US Ambassador denied .
Matters came to a head when the Government revoked the work permit of the head of the project , Mr. Glenn Bradbury .
This prompted the US Ambassador to issue a statement that Guyana 's action was contrary to the understanding of the two countries with respect to the project .
This prompted the US Ambassador to issue a statement that Guyana 's action was contrary to the understanding of the two countries with respect to the project .
He met subsequently with the Head of the Presidential Secretariat , and the two parties issued a joint statement that the project has been placed on hold pending further negotiations .
He met subsequently with the Head of the Presidential Secretariat , and the two parties issued a joint statement that the project has been placed on hold pending further negotiations .
The Ambassador indicated that the United States welcomed the Government 's willingness to engage in further dialogue on the project .
The Ambassador indicated that the United States welcomed the Government 's willingness to engage in further dialogue on the project .
